attributes.action: Protect our children!! Enforce REAL sentences for Paedophiles!
attributes.additional_details:
Aiming to gain, a realistic but reasonable sentence for all Paedophiles.
Ideally a minimum of 25years for any indecent act against a child.
Recently a child abuser in England was handed a suspended sentence and community hours after raping a 9year old child in her own home. That isn't justice...That's a joke!
attributes.background: The UK justice system is a disgrace. Paedophiles are allowed to walk our streets and mingle with society sometimes within months of being sentenced. We want harsh sentences, we want JUSTICE!!
